TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySchemaClass extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: The ActiveDirectorySchemaClass class represents a schema class definition that is contained in the schema partition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string ldapDisplayName) cil managed

Docs.param: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that specifies the context for this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the LDAP display name for this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object that was created to the underlying directory store.

Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> object that contains the auxiliary classes of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> object that contains <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> objects that represent the auxiliary classes of the current schema class object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the CN of the current class object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the default <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> descriptor of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> object that represents the default security descriptor for the current schema class object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a description of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains a description of the current class object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases the resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: `true` if the managed resources should be released; `false` if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass FindByName (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string ldapDisplayName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass FindByName(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string ldapDisplayName) cil managed

Docs.param: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that specifies the context for the search.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema class for the search.
Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object for the schema class that was found. Returns `null` if the class was not found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection GetAllProperties() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> collection that contains all properties, including ancestor properties, of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> collection of the properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass>, including ancestor properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the method is called on an unbound object instance, an empty <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> collection is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object that represents the directory entry for the schema class.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object is defunct.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates if the current schema class object is defunct. `true` if the object is defunct; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> object that contains the properties that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> must contain.

For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the OID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the OID of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.

Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> object that contains the properties that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> can contain.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> objects that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object can contain.

Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> objects that this class can contain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Commits all changes to the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object to the underlying directory store.

Gets or sets the schemaIDGUID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object. For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Guid"> object that contains the schemaIDGUID for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object. For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SchemaGuid is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the schema class from which the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object is derived.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object that contains the schema class from which the current schema class is derived. `null` if no schema class was specified during the creation of the current class.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"> type for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"> value that contains the type of the current <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object.
